thread.section_title: Mikes Dive Store Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of mikesdivestore.com
thread.title: Jon Camps
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Jon Camps

author: Jon Camps
title: Jon Camps
text: I have used Mikes Dive Store a few times now and wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to anyone. Happy to answer any questions and offer expert advice, frequently the cheapest place to buy specific quality branded items. Their customer service is second to none and keep you updated on the progress of your order all the way. Oh and the lollypops are a great touch.
